DevelopingArea.title: Area in Development
DevelopingArea.message: I am working on implementing this feature.

sectionAbout.info.1: Hello! My name is Guilherme, I have a degree in Computer Engineering from the State University of Ponta Grossa (UEPG) and I work as a fullstack developer. My specialty is developing robust backends using C#, while on the frontend I focus on delivering dynamic experiences with JavaScript and React.
sectionAbout.info.2: I have experience in API development and process automation (RPA) and I am currently steering my career towards areas like MLOps and Artificial Intelligence. I believe that learning Cloud Computing is essential for this transition and I am continuously seeking new ways to expand my technical and professional knowledge.

sectionExperience.description1.0: Period: July/2014 - Present Company: FAPEC - Foundation for Support to Research, Teaching, and Culture. Summary: I worked as a Full Stack developer, utilizing various skills and technologies. On the front-end, I used JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, React.js, CSS, and HTML to develop complete web systems. On the back-end, I worked with C#, .NET Framework, and Microsoft SQL Server to ensure the quality and reliability of the applications. Additionally, I maintained and improved existing applications, integrated REST APIs, and developed new ones. My experience includes creating and managing SQL databases, as well as robotic process automation (RPA) to optimize repetitive tasks and increase productivity. I have basic familiarity with domain-driven design (DDD).
sectionExperience.description2.0: Period: April/2022 - July/2023 Company: SEED/PR - State Department of Education of Paran치. Summary: My activities involved developing both front-end and back-end applications using React and C#, respectively, and their communication with SQL databases. I also participated in project planning, requirement gathering, documentation development, and system feasibility analysis.
sectionExperience.description3.0: Period: April/2017 - April/2019 and February/2021 - December/2021 Company: UEPG - State University of Ponta Grossa. Summary: I was responsible for providing comprehensive technical support to users, solving issues and ensuring the smooth operation of technological resources. I organized and provided technical support for events and live streams, from equipment setup to troubleshooting. I scheduled and moderated videoconferences and live sessions, promoting effective communication. I also performed preventive and corrective maintenance on recording studio equipment to ensure availability and optimal performance for audiovisual content production.
sectionExperience.description4.0: Period: November/2020 - December/2020 Company: Yellow Technologies. Summary: I participated in web page development projects, from design to full implementation (full stack). I also performed bug fixes in existing applications and provided technical support to clients.
sectionExperience.description5.0: Period: March/2020 - July/2020 Company: Vamilly Innovations in IT Solutions LTDA. Summary: I worked with full stack web development, bug fixing, and customer support.

sectionPortfolio.introDescription: This portfolio was created to showcase my skills and projects in a structured and interactive manner. It is divided into four main sections: Frontend, Backend, Services, and Artificial Intelligence, each highlighting technologies used, challenges faced, and solutions implemented. Feel free to explore and learn more about my work. If you have any questions, feel free to get in touch!
sectionPortfolio.frontendDescription: Developed with JS, CSS, and React, this frontend serves as the showcase of my work. Explore my projects and discover my capabilities, leveraging features such as responsiveness, dark mode, multi-language support, API integration, and authentication (Google and internal).
sectionPortfolio.backendDescription:
This section focuses on the RESTful API that connects the frontend to the services.
 Using secure JWT authentication and storage in a PostgreSQL database, the backend ensures efficient and secure communication, including integration with Machine Learning services.
sectionPortfolio.aiemlDescription:
This stage contains examples demonstrating the implementation of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. 
Developed and exposed via Flask API, they utilize libraries like Pandas and NumPy for data processing and Scikit-learn for training and inference. 
Everything is containerized with Docker.
sectionPortfolio.servicesDescription:
Manages orchestration, database, and deployment. 
PostgreSQL and the Machine Learning service run together in Docker containers, ensuring integration and portability. 
Docker Compose facilitates orchestration, while GitHub Actions automate CI/CD.
